content.p: As a world-leading centre for research in the design, testing and use of medicines, we enjoy strong collaborations with partners in the pharmaceutical, biopharma and biomaterials sectors. Our well-established links with local hospitals mean weâ€™re one of the few academic centres that can perform virtually everything in the classic drug discovery and development cascade, from target identification to clinical trials. We can also help you find solutions to your formulation and advanced manufacturing needs. Caroline Sykes Business Partnerships Manager caroline.sykes@nottingham.ac.uk
